entry.title: Proxy Custom Socket.IO Namespaces with NGINX

entry.title: Getting started with Vue.js: AngularJS perspective
entry.summary: Writing Vue.js applications after working with AngularJS will feel familiar. Vue won't pack as many goodies out of the box, but it will still give Angular a run for its money.

entry.summary: Translations in different languages, files and formats have a tendency to become messy - outsourcing translation management to the cloud can be an easy way out.

entry.title: What's rotten in the state of Denmark?
